snippet: By refusing to negotiate on the budget, Republicans are inviting another fiscal crisis.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Congressional Republicans for refusing to negotiate on budget, and thereby inviting another fiscal crisis.
lead_paragraph: By refusing to negotiate on the budget, Republicans are inviting another fiscal crisis.

headline.seo: The House Prefers Chaos to Order
headline.main: The House Prefers Chaos to Order
headline.print_headline: The House Prefers Chaos to Order
